creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Créez le parc Disney de vos rêves, rempli d'attachants personnages Disney, Pixar et Star Wars™, d'attractions excitantes et d'événements spéciaux ! Rejoignez plus de 90 millions de joueurs du monde entier qui ont retrouvé leur âme d'enfant en construisant leur propre royaume magique sur mobile.

✨COLLECTIONNEZ PLUS DE 200 PERSONNAGES DISNEY, PIXAR ET STAR WARS™
► De La Petite Sirène à La Belle et la Bête, Moana, Le Roi Lion, Histoire de jouets, et plus !
► Des personnages issus de plus de 90 ans de magie Disney !
► Embarquez pour plus de 1500 quêtes enchanteresses !

🎡 CRÉEZ LE PARC DE VOS RÊVES
► Construisez plus de 170 attractions des parcs Disney comme Space Mountain, Haunted Mansion, et ""it’s a small world"" !
► Décorez et personnalisez votre parc à votre guise !
► Organisez des parades de chars emblématiques et des feux d'artifice !

⚔️ COMBATTEZ LES MÉCHANTS DISNEY
► Sauvez votre parc de l'abominable malédiction de Maléfique !
► Combattez Ursula, Gaston, Scar, Jafar et d'autres !

🎉 DES ÉVÉNEMENTS RÉGULIERS
► De nouveaux personnages, de nouvelles attractions et d'autres contenus ajoutés régulièrement !
► Des événements spéciaux mensuels et hebdomadaires avec des récompenses à durée limitée !

✈️ JOUEZ OÙ ET QUAND VOUS VOULEZ !
► Grâce au mode hors-ligne, vous pouvez emporter votre parc avec vous !
► Amenez la magie chez vous !

_____________________________________________
Vous pouvez télécharger et jouer à ce jeu gratuitement. Notez qu'il vous permet de jouer à l'aide de monnaie virtuelle, que vous pouvez gagner en progressant en jeu, en décidant de regarder des publicités ou en payant au moyen d'argent réel. Les achats de monnaie virtuelle au moyen d'argent réel s'effectuent par carte de crédit ou tout autre moyen de paiement associé à votre compte, et sont activés lorsque vous saisissez votre mot de passe Google Play, sans devoir saisir votre numéro de carte de crédit ou votre code PIN à nouveau.
Les achats intégrés peuvent être limités en ajustant les paramètres d'authentification dans vos paramètres Play Store (Menu Google Play Store > Paramètres > Exiger l'authentification pour les achats) et en établissant un mot de passe pour chaque achat / toutes les 30 minutes ou Jamais.
Désactiver la protection par mot de passe peut causer des achats non autorisés. Nous vous encourageons fortement à maintenir active la protection par mot de passe si vous avez des enfants ou si d'autres personnes peuvent accéder à votre appareil.
Ce jeu contient de la publicité pour les produits Gameloft ou de la publicité tierce qui vous redirigera vers un site tiers. Vous pouvez désactiver l'identifiant publicitaire utilisé pour les publicités ciblées dans le menu Paramètres de votre appareil. Cette option se trouve dans Paramètres > Comptes (personnel) > Google > Publicités (Paramètres et vie privée) > Désactiver la diffusion d'annonces ciblées par centre d'intérêt.
Certains aspects de ce jeu nécessitent une connexion Internet.

_____________________________________________

Politique de confidentialité : http://www.gameloft.com/fr/privacy-notice
Conditions d'utilisation : http://www.gameloft.com/fr/conditions-of-use
Contrat de licence d'utilisateur final : http://www.gameloft.com/fr/eula
descriptionShort: Create the Disney Park of your dreams in the most magical place on mobile!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
IT’S A SMALL UNDERWORLD, AFTER ALL!
Well, well, well… our Wonderboy is here! Hercules, Pegasus, Meg, Phil, and more characters from the beloved Disney classic are coming to the Kingdom. Yet as always, Hades has a plan: He wants to drag Hercules down into the Underworld! Help our heroes go the distance!

A HEROIC EVENT!
Join the Mega Event on June 4, and collect Attractions and Concessions such as Zeus’ Temple, the Statue Garden, the Training Grounds and more!

title: Disney Magic Kingdoms: Build Your Own Magical Park

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Create the Disney Park of your dreams, filled with beloved Disney, Pixar and Star Wars™ characters, exciting attractions and special events! Join over 90 million players worldwide who have embraced their inner child building their own magical place on mobile.

✨COLLECT OVER 200+ DISNEY, PIXAR AND STAR WARS™ CHARACTERS
► From The Little Mermaid to Beauty and the Beast, Moana, The Lion King, Toy Story, and more!
► Characters from over 90 years of Disney magic!
► Adventure in over 1,500 whimsical quests!

🎡 BUILD YOUR OWN DREAM PARK
► Build your Park with 170+ Disney Park attractions like Space Mountain, Haunted Mansion, and “it’s a small world”!
► Decorate and customize the Park your way!
► Celebrate with iconic parade floats and fireworks!


⚔️ BATTLE DISNEY VILLAINS
► Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse!
► Battle against Ursula, Gaston, Scar, Jafar and more!


🎉 REGULAR EVENTS
► New characters, attractions and other content added regularly!
► Monthly and weekly special events with limited-time rewards!


✈️ PLAY ANYWHERE, ANYTIME!
► With offline mode, you can take your Park with you on the go!
► Bring the magic home with you!


_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.

_____________________________________________

Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-notice
Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-use
End-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WELCOME A CLEVER OWL
Sometimes, the smallest things take up the most room in your heart…! Join the limited-time Tower Challenge starting July 16, and welcome the wisest Owl of them all with the help of Winnie the Pooh and friends!
And remember, nobody can be uncheered with a balloon!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
GET YOUR GROOVE ON
Boom, baby! It's all about Kuzco. Join characters from The Emperor's New Groove in a new drama llama-filled addition to the Kingdom Quest storyline!
Help Kuzco and Pacha out of another hairy predicament, while Kronk and Yzma try to finish the job -- just don't forget the spinach puffs!

LEND A HAND WITH GORD
Maleficent is back! Help Gord lend a hand in our latest Tower Challenge. Defeat Maleficent and clear the curse to earn new bonus content during the Event!

title: Disney Magic Kingdoms: Build Your Own Magical Park

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Create the Disney Park of your dreams, filled with beloved Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters, exciting attractions and special events! Join over 90 million players worldwide who have embraced their inner child building their own magical place on mobile.

✨

COLLECT OVER 200+ DISNEY, PIXAR AND STAR WARS™ CHARACTERS


From The Little Mermaid to Beauty and the Beast, Moana, The Lion King, Toy Story, and more iconic Disney characters!
Characters from over 90 years of Disney magic! Come and join this unique Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ experience. Play with Peter Pan, Ariel, Nemo… and have fun with Ralph, Dumbo or R2-D2! They're all waiting for you!
Adventure in over 1,500 whimsical quests featuring Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters!

🎡

BUILD YOUR OWN DREAM PARK


Build your Park with 170+ attractions like Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, and “it’s a small world”!
A game for the whole family! Play with Elsa from Frozen, Simba from The Lion King, Woody from Toy Story, and more Disney friends—and accompany them through magical quests!
Embark on new adventures, decorate the Park your way, and celebrate with iconic parade floats and fireworks!

⚔️

BATTLE DISNEY VILLAINS


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free!
Come and visit the Haunted Mansion and the Tower of Terror, and battle against the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fierce Scar, the mighty Jafar and more!

🎉

REGULAR LIMITED-TIME EVENTS


The fun never stops in this adventure, with brand-new characters, attractions and other content added regularly.
Enjoy monthly and weekly special events and earn limited-time rewards!

✈️

PLAY OFFLINE: ANYWHERE, ANYTIME!


Have fun anywhere and anytime, and take your Park with you on the go. Play with your Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters while you are offline, and bring the magic home with you!
_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
Minimum Device Requirements:
CPU: Dual-Core 1 GHz (1.3 GHz and above recommended)
RAM: 1 GB RAM (2 GB RAM and above recommended)
GPU: Adreno 225, Mali-400 MP4, PowerVR SGX540

_____________________________________________

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
GET YOUR GROOVE ON
Boom, baby! It's all about Kuzco. Join characters from The Emperor's New Groove in a new drama llama-filled addition to the Kingdom Quest storyline!
Help Kuzco and Pacha out of another hairy predicament, while Kronk and Yzma try to finish the job -- just don't forget the spinach puffs!

LEND A HAND WITH GORD
Maleficent is back! Help Gord lend a hand in our latest Tower Challenge. Defeat Maleficent and clear the curse to earn new bonus content during the Event!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WALK THE WAY OF THE MANDALORE
Bounty Hunting is a complicated profession… and the characters from The Mandalorian have made it to the Kingdom! Welcome The Mandalorian, The Child, Cara Dune, Greef Karga and Kuiil, and celebrate the release of The Mandalorian - Season 2 with us!
We have spoken… come in, regroup in Nevarro City, and join forces to protect The Child. This is the way!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
LET THE WISPS GUIDE YOU
Our fate lives within us… you only have to be brave enough to see it! In this epic, brand-new limited-time event, Merida, Queen Elinor, King Fergus, Lord Macintosh, Lord MacGuffin and Lord Dingwall are coming to the Kingdom, standing their ground and destined for adventure!
Last, but not least… we’re also adding the Comfy Merida costume to the game, so that you can continue your Comfy Princesses collection! And remember, a princess doesn’t play with her haggis!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
ANYONE CAN COOK...
... But only the fearless can be great! Remy, Alfredo Linguini and Colette from Disney and Pixar’s Ratatouille are coming to Disney Magic Kingdoms... and something exciting is definitely cooking!
So what are you waiting for...? Bonjour! Come on in! Enjoy this new permanent addition to the storyline, because we're in Paris now, baby!

Characters from over 90 years of Disney magic! Come and join this unique Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ experience. Play with Peter Pan, Ariel, Nemo… and have fun with Ralph, Dumbo or R2-D2! They're all waiting for you!
Adventure in over 1,500 whimsical quests featuring Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters!

🎡

BUILD YOUR OWN DREAM PARK


Build your Park with 170+ attractions like Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, and “it’s a small world”!
A game for the whole family! Play with Elsa from Frozen, Simba from The Lion King, Woody from Toy Story, and more Disney friends—and accompany them through magical quests!
Embark on new adventures, decorate the Park your way, and celebrate with iconic parade floats and fireworks!

⚔️

BATTLE DISNEY VILLAINS


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free!
Come and visit the Haunted Mansion and the Hollywood Tower of Terror, and battle against the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fierce Scar, the mighty Jafar and more!

🎉

REGULAR LIMITED-TIME EVENTS


The fun never stops in this adventure, with brand-new characters, attractions and other content added regularly.
Enjoy monthly and weekly special events and earn limited-time rewards!

✈️

PLAY OFFLINE: ANYWHERE, ANYTIME!


Have fun anywhere and anytime, and take your Park with you on the go. Play with your Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters while you are offline, and bring the magic home with you!
_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
Minimum Device Requirements:
CPU: Dual-Core 1 GHz (1.3 GHz and above recommended)
RAM: 1.5 GB RAM (2 GB RAM and above recommended)
GPU: Adreno 225, Mali-400 MP4, PowerVR SGX540

descriptionShort: Create the Disney Park of your dreams in the most magical place on mobile!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
ANYONE CAN COOK...
... But only the fearless can be great! Remy, Alfredo Linguini and Colette from Disney and Pixar’s Ratatouille are coming to Disney Magic Kingdoms... and something exciting is definitely cooking!
So what are you waiting for...? Bonjour! Come on in! Enjoy this new permanent addition to the storyline, because we're in Paris now, baby!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

The river is treacherous... and this is just the beginning of the journey!
Celebrate the release of Raya and the Last Dragon with Disney Magic Kingdoms and embark on this adventure together with Raya, her faithful steed Tuk Tuk, Sisu, Namaari and Boun! Be fearless, never waiver, and believe in the power of community. We're stronger together!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
PREPARE FOR BATTLE
This is our most desperate hour… It is a period of civil war, and the Rebels are preparing for their next battle against the evil Galactic Empire. Welcome Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo, Chewbacca, Darth Vader and one of his best TIE Fighter Pilots to the Kingdom, and get ready for a STAR WARS™: Episode IV - A New Hope limited-time event that will be long remembered!
The approach will not be easy… but there’s hope! May the Force be with you!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
PREPARE FOR BATTLE
This is our most desperate hour… It is a period of civil war, and the Rebels are preparing for their next battle against the evil Galactic Empire. Welcome Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo, Chewbacca, Darth Vader and one of his best TIE Fighter Pilots to the Kingdom, and get ready for a STAR WARS™: Episode IV - A New Hope limited-time event that will be long remembered!
The approach will not be easy… but there’s hope! May the Force be with you!

title: Disney Magic Kingdoms: Build Your Own Magical Park

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Create the Disney Park of your dreams, filled with beloved Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters, exciting attractions and special events! Join over 90 million players worldwide who enjoy the magic every day!

✨

COLLECT OVER 200+ DISNEY, PIXAR AND STAR WARS™ CHARACTERS


From The Little Mermaid to Beauty and the Beast, Moana, The Lion King, Toy Story, and more iconic Disney characters!
Characters from over 90 years of Disney magic! Come and join this unique Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ experience. Play with Peter Pan, Ariel, Nemo… and have fun with Ralph, Dumbo or R2-D2! They're all waiting for you!
Adventure in over 1,500 whimsical quests featuring Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters!

🎡

BUILD YOUR OWN DREAM PARK


Build your Park with 170+ attractions like Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, and “it’s a small world”!
A game for the whole family! Play with Elsa from Frozen, Simba from The Lion King, Woody from Toy Story, and more Disney friends—and accompany them through magical quests!
Embark on new adventures, decorate the Park your way, and celebrate with iconic parade floats and fireworks!

⚔️

BATTLE DISNEY VILLAINS


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free!
Come and visit the Haunted Mansion and the Hollywood Tower of Terror, and battle against the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fierce Scar, the mighty Jafar and more!

🎉

REGULAR LIMITED-TIME EVENTS


The fun never stops in this adventure, with brand-new characters, attractions and other content added regularly.
Enjoy monthly and weekly special events and earn limited-time rewards!

✈️

PLAY OFFLINE: ANYWHERE, ANYTIME!


Have fun anywhere and anytime, and take your Park with you on the go. Play with your Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ characters while you are offline, and bring the magic home with you!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WHALE, HELLO THERE!

World Ocean Day is a big deal at the Marine Life Institute, where guest speaker Destiny from Disney and Pixar’s Finding Dory learned all about it! She’s challenging Nemo, Squirt and Dory to scatter around the reef and find the coolest whale shark facts they can!

Who will win the day? Come and join our limited-time event featuring Destiny the Whale Shark and Bailey the Beluga. Let’s work together to turn the tide with this very special collaboration with Ocean Conservancy!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
THE WORLD IS YOURS!
It’s early November in Portorosso, and Luca and Giulia have returned home for the first holiday of the school year. Together with Alberto, they’re preparing to transform Giulia’s fish-delivery bike into a top-of-the-line racing machine!
We were just here for the pasta… but now this is turning into maximum excitement! Join our limited-time event featuring Luca, Alberto, Giulia, Ercole, and Machiavelli and get ready to win the big rematch. Go Underdogs!

title: Disney Magic Kingdoms: Build Your Own Magical Park

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Create a magical Disney Park filled with Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ characters, attractions, and special events.

COLLECT OVER 200+ DISNEY, PIXAR AND STAR WARS™ CHARACTERS


Collect characters and heroes from the last 90 years of Disney’s history, including The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, The Lion King, Toy Story, and many more.
Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

BUILD YOUR OWN DREAM PARK


Build a Disney Park with 170+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

BATTLE DISNEY VILLAINS


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

REGULAR LIMITED-TIME EVENTS


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.
Earn limited-time rewards with monthly and weekly special events.

PLAY OFFLINE: ANYTIME, ANYWHERE


Take your Disney Park with you on the go. Play online or offline anytime you want.
_____________________________________________

New Characters

• Patch

New Attractions

• Radcliffe Residence
• Cruella’s Car

New Concessions

Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park


Build a Disney Park with 170+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

Battle Disney Villains


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

Regular Limited-Time Events


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In celebration of the Walt Disney World 50th Anniversary, we are redesigning the Kingdom and introducing new attractions, concession items, decorations, and costumes inspired by the ones at Walt Disney World Resort!

And just in time for Halloween, join our limited-time event featuring the hitchhiking ghosts Ezra, Gus, and Phineas, and the “Hatbox Ghost” from the Haunted Mansion attraction in Disneyland and Disney World!

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
THE MANDALORIAN HAS RETURNED

Join The Mandalorian: Season 2 limited-time event filled with Blurrgs, Reptavians, and Ice Spiders. And that’s not all! Get ready to welcome Ahsoka Tano, Fennec Shand, and Boba Fett to the Kingdom.

LEFOU TOWER EVENT

Is LeFou from Beauty and the Beast still missing from your Kingdom? Well, Gaston’s #1 sidekick is back! Join our limited-time tower event and welcome this accident-prone little guy to your park.

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Pinocchio has arrived in the Kingdom! Welcome characters from this Disney classic to your park, along with unique attractions and concessions inspired by the film:

New Characters
• Pinocchio
• Jiminy Cricket
• Geppetto
• Figaro
• Blue Fairy
• Honest John
• Stromboli

New Attractions
• Geppetto’s Workshop
• Pinocchio's Daring Journey
• Pinocchio Village Haus
• Stromboli's Caravan

New Concessions
• Pinocchio's Hat Stand
• Jiminy Cricket's Hat Stand

New Pinocchio Parade Float

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome New Characters from Mulan
Khan has finally trotted his way into the Kingdom! Reunite Mulan with her beloved steed, but beware of the Huns and their ruthless leader Shan Yu. His mission? To track down Mulan and seek revenge.

Lunar New Year Costumes Are Back
Celebrate the year of the Tiger with Mickey, Minnie, Donald, and Daisy as they once again don their beautifully festive Lunar New Year and Lunar New Year - Hong Kong costumes. Discover our new tapper event and enjoy the fireworks!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
“Someday there’ll be happiness again in Nottingham!”

Robin Hood has arrived in the Kingdom! Join Robin Hood, Little John and Maid Marian in their quest to take down the greedy Prince John and his sneaky ally Sir Hiss. Help them steal the royal seal and forge an “official” letter to bring back the benevolent King Richard for good!

• Sherwood Forest

New Concessions
• Blackberry Pie Stand
• Robin Hood’s Hat Stand

New Robin Hood Parade Float

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The Rescuers–Part One

After receiving a cryptic message from Penny asking for help, Bianca makes her way to Penny’s home. Meanwhile, Bernard rushes to the Rescue Aid Society headquarters to warn the assembled mice.

Join Bernard and his proud pilot Orville in part one of this permanent addition to the Kingdom Quests storyline. Stay tuned for more characters as the story unfolds in our next update.

New Attraction:
The Rescue Aid Society

New Concession:
Marshmallow Gummy Mug Shake Stand

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
More Rewards Coming Your Way!
Get more of what you want with our brand-new season pass! Use the Happiness you earn from daily and weekly tasks to unlock exclusive season pass rewards.

The Rescuers: Part 2
The Devil’s Eye diamond has been transferred to a special exhibit at the United Nations, and Madam Medusa is plotting to steal it! Join Bernard, Miss Bianca, and Penny as they make their way to Medusa’s Riverboat to uncover the details of her fiendish plan.

Carl finally cracks open the last cargo crate from the “Spirit of Adventure” and discovers one of Muntz’s old journals chronicling the last few months of his hunt for Kevin. Join Carl, Russell and Dug in this limited-time event as they learn more about the expedition that consumed Charles Muntz.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s Just a Bunch of Hocus Pocus
Celebrate the release of Hocus Pocus 2 with the Sanderson sisters in our limited-time Halloween event. Join Mary, Sarah and Winifred in their ongoing quest for immortality and unlock fa-boo-lous attractions, concessions, and decorations inspired by the films.

New Rewards are Here
Season 2 has arrived and with it comes lots of exciting new content! Complete daily, weekly, and event tasks to unlock season rewards and complete your collections.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Complete Your DuckTales Collection
Webby has finally arrived at the Park as part of the permanent Kingdom Quests story line! Join her as she reunites with Huey, Dewey, Louie, and Uncle Scrooge and explores the wonders of the Kingdom from the comfort of the Golden Condor.

The Rescuers -- Part 3
Madame Medusa finally makes a play for the Devil’s Eye -- embarking on what she thinks is the heist of the century! Can Bernard, Bianca and Penny stop her before it’s too late?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome The Hunchback of Notre Dame to the Kingdom.

Hungry for revenge, Judge Claude Frollo has captured Quasimodo and imprisoned him in the Palace of Justice. Join Esmeralda, Djali, and Phoebus on their quest to save Quasimodo and bring down the despicable judge.

New Attractions, Concessions, and Parade Float:
- Clopin's Puppet Wagon
- Bells of Notre Dame
- Festival Cap and Bells Stand
- Festival Scepter Stand
- The Hunchback of Notre Dame Parade Float

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Don't Just Fly, Soar!
Welcome Mr. Stork to the Kingdom and reunite Dumbo with his mother, Mrs. Jumbo. Also, give your visitors a ride down memory lane with the Casey Jr. Circus Train attraction from Disney Parks.

Oscar-Winning Rewards

Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park


Build a Disney Park with 170+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

Battle Disney Villains


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

Regular Limited-Time Events


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.
Earn limited-time rewards with monthly and weekly special events.

Play Offline: Anytime, Anywhere


Take your Disney Park with you on the go. Play online or offline anytime you want.

_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Life Is Full of Possibilities

Disney and Pixar’s ""Soul"" arrives in the Kingdom! Welcome these beloved Pixar characters to your park, along with unique attractions and concessions inspired by the film:

New Characters
• Joe Gardner
• 22
• Dorothea Williams
• Moonwind
• Mr. Mittens

New Costume
• Moonwind's Soul World costume

New Attractions
• The Jazz Club
• The Great Before

New Concessions
• New York-Style Pizza Stand
• Mr. Mittens Milkshake Mug Stand

New ""Soul"" Parade Float

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The extraordinary Madrigals have arrived!

Mirabel recruits Luisa to unearth a “long-lost treasure” in Bruno’s tower, and it looks like Luisa may have to put off the deadlifts yet again… Join Luisa, Isabela, Mirabel, Antonio, and Bruno as they uncover new stories, plenty of music and have some family bonding along the way!

Relive this magical Disney story, and add the amazing Casita and Isabela’s enchanting room to your Kingdom. Make sure your visitors grab a pair of Encanto ears too!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A Disney Classic Returns!
New characters from Disney's Bambi are making their way to the Kingdom for a brand-new adventure! Welcome Faline and the Great Prince of the Forest as they reunite with their forest friends.

Also, Season 4 is here with new Disney content from Winnie the Pooh and Mulan! Complete Daily, Weekly, and Event Tasks to unlock Season Rewards and complete your collections.

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Characters from STAR WARS™ and The Mandalorian™ have landed in the Kingdom!

Join our limited-time event from May 18 – June 2 and complete your collection of the original trilogy with the Dark Lord himself, Emperor Palpatine. And from The Mandalorian™, get ready to welcome the evil warlord Moff Gideon and the Mandalorian leader Bo-Katan Kryze.

Finally, give your visitors an exciting new experience from The Mandalorian™ with the Gideon’s Light Cruiser attraction.

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Disney & Pixar's Inside Out has arrived!

With Sadness in charge of Dream Duty, she receives word that Joy has traveled to Riley’s subconscious to confront her fear of Jangles the Clown, and soon realizes that Joy is in over her head.

Join Sadness in this new limited-time adventure as she and the other emotions journey to Riley’s subconscious to save Joy from Riley’s greatest fear.

New Inside Out Characters, Attractions, Concessions, and more.

title: Disney Magic Kingdoms

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Create a magical Disney Park filled with Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ characters, attractions, and special events.

Collect Over 300 Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ Characters


Collect characters and heroes from 100 years of Disney’s history, including The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, The Lion King, Toy Story, and many more.
Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park


Build a Disney Park with 170+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

Battle Disney Villains


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

Regular Limited-Time Events


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.
Earn limited-time rewards with monthly and weekly special events.

Play Offline: Anytime, Anywhere


Take your Disney Park with you on the go. Play online or offline anytime you want.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A meow-sical Limited-Time Event!

The Disney classic ""The Aristocats"" is coming to the Kingdom! Welcome the famous felines to your park, and discover unique Attractions, Concessions, Decorations and a new Parade Float inspired by the film.

Join Duchess, Thomas O'Malley, Marie, Toulouse and Berlioz in a swinging party at Madame's Mansion to benefit her cat foundation -- where every cat in Paris gets the chance to show off their unique artistic talents!

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hold your breath & get ready for a nostalgic journey!

Unleash the magic as The Black Cauldron arrives in the Kingdom! Taran, Eilonwy, Gurgi, & Fflewddur Fflam make their grand return after conquering the formidable Horned King. Join their adventure where heroes rise, dangers loom, and destiny beckons…

Celebrate their hard-earned triumph by giving them a warm welcome to your park, and uncover unique attractions, concessions, decorations & a new parade float inspired by the essence of the film.

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
100 Years of Magic!
Celebrate Disney's 100th anniversary with commemorative new Mickey & Minnie Mouse costumes!

Our Beloved Wizard Is Now Playable!
After many years of serving as Disney Magic Kingdoms' official guide and mentor, Merlin is becoming a fully playable character who you can now add to your collection and take on exciting Kingdom quests.

And just in time for the 60th anniversary of "The Sword in the Stone," experience even more of the Disney classic by Welcoming Wart to the Kingdom!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"It’s time to meet The Muppets in the Kingdom tonight!”

Lend a hand to Kermit the Frog, Rowlf, the Swedish Chef, Animal and the one-and-only Miss Piggy as they put on a brand-new Muppets show.

Iconic attractions will be made available to Kingdomers this update, including Walt Disney World's Muppet*Vision 3D attraction. Plus, rock on and on with a Parade Float inspired by Electric Mayhem!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WELCOME NEW CHARACTERS FROM MULAN
For a limited time, you can welcome Yao, Ling, and Chien-Po to the Kingdom. But that’s not all – we’re also bringing back the Tung-Shao Toboggans Attraction. Add this rag-tag trio and thrilling Attraction to your park before they’re gone!

LUNAR NEW YEAR COSTUMES ARE BACK
Celebrate the year of the dragon with Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, and Daisy Duck as they once again don their beautifully festive Lunar and Lunar New Year – Hong Kong costumes.

Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park


Build a Disney Park with 400+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

Battle Disney Villains


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

Regular Limited-Time Events


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.
Earn limited-time rewards with monthly and weekly special events.

Play Offline: Anytime, Anywhere


Take your Disney Park with you on the go. Play online or offline anytime you want.

_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WELCOME NEW CHARACTERS FROM MULAN
For a limited time, you can welcome Yao, Ling, and Chien-Po to the Kingdom. But that’s not all – we’re also bringing back the Tung-Shao Toboggans Attraction. Add this rag-tag trio and thrilling Attraction to your park before they’re gone!

LUNAR NEW YEAR COSTUMES ARE BACK
Celebrate the year of the dragon with Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, and Daisy Duck as they once again don their beautifully festive Lunar and Lunar New Year – Hong Kong costumes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Manny and Sid are coming to the Kingdom!

That's right, Kingdomer, to conclude this winter season, the iconic gang from 20th Century Studios' Ice Age is joining the Kingdom. Join Manny, Diego, Scrat, Baby Scrat & Sid in this brand-new quest for them to discover the region and face the earthquake caused by... Scrat (who else?).

Discover the new limited-time event and the new Attractions, Concessions, Decorations and Parade Float.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Manny and Sid are coming to the Kingdom!

That's right, Kingdomer, to conclude this winter season, the iconic gang from 20th Century Studios' Ice Age is joining the Kingdom. Join Manny, Diego, Scrat, Baby Scrat & Sid in this brand-new quest for them to discover the region and face the earthquake caused by... Scrat (who else?).

Discover the new limited-time event and the new Attractions, Concessions, Decorations and Parade Float.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
IT’S TIME TO WELCOME THE GODS

Hercules fans, rejoice! Hera and Zeus are swooping into the Kingdom for our limited-time Hercules event. Plus, be on the lookout for the ferocious three-headed Hydra.

But that's not all. If you loved the Underworld boss battle from our first Hercules update, then hold on to your togas! Our brand-new Underworld attraction is here, so seize the chance to add some divine darkness to your park.

descriptionShort: Create a magical Disney Park filled with memorable characters and attractions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Spring has arrived on Ant Island!
The colony has spent a long winter rebuilding from the grasshoppers’ attack, and it’s finally time to take a well-deserved break. Even most of the circus bugs have taken a weekend trip into the city to take in a show or two—except for Heimlich, who has a feeling he’s going to start pupating any day now. But when Hopper makes an unexpected return, it’s up to Flik, Dot, and Atta to send him packing!

• New concessions and decorations from various collections

Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park


Build a Disney Park with 400+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

Battle Disney Villains


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

Regular Limited-Time Events


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.
Earn limited-time rewards with monthly and weekly special events.

Play Offline: Anytime, Anywhere


Take your Disney Park with you on the go. Play online or offline anytime you want.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
THE PUPS WELCOME ANITA AND ROGER!

Canine lovers, rejoice! New characters from the classic animated Disney film, 101 Dalmatians, are joining the Kingdom! We finally reunite Perdita and Pongo with their favorite humans. That's right Kingdomers, Anita and Roger are coming to the Kingdom, and bringing a cute new puppy with them, Freckles!

Celebrate International Dog Day with this brand-new mini event and addition to the 101 Dalmatians in-game storyline.

THE PUPS WELCOME ANITA AND ROGER!

Canine lovers, rejoice! New characters from the classic animated Disney film, 101 Dalmatians, are joining the Kingdom! We finally reunite Perdita and Pongo with their favorite humans. That's right Kingdomers, Anita and Roger are coming to the Kingdom, and bringing a cute new puppy with them, Freckles!

Celebrate International Dog Day with this brand-new mini event and addition to the 101 Dalmatians in-game storyline.

title:
Disney Magic Kingdoms
9.5.0j

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Create a magical Disney Park filled with Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ characters, attractions, and special events.

Collect Over 300 Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ Characters


Collect characters and heroes from 100 years of Disney’s history, including The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, The Lion King, Toy Story, and many more.
Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park


Build a Disney Park with 400+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

Battle Disney Villains


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

Regular Limited-Time Events


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.
Earn limited-time rewards with monthly and weekly special events.

Play Offline: Anytime, Anywhere


Take your Disney Park with you on the go. Play online or offline anytime you want.

_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
Minimum Device Requirements:
CPU: Quad-Core 1.2 GHz
RAM: 3 GB RAM
GPU: Adreno 304, Mali T604, PowerVR G6100

_____________________________________________

This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app, including paid random items, and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-use
Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-notice
End-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Discover the timeless charm of Disney's Silly Symphony series!

Don't miss this magical opportunity to relive a beloved classic. Discover Disney's Silly Symphonies in Disney Magic Kingdoms! A brand-new IP collection with classic characters and a brand-new quest line. Join Little Red Riding Hood and the Three Little Pigs as they work together to outsmart the Big Bad Wolf.

In this update, our Collection Book will be fully redesigned in order to offer a better experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Anyone can cook! Welcome Emile and Anton Ego as permanent characters in your Ratatouille collection. Add Disney magic to your park with these beloved Pixar characters.

In Season 10, Kingdom Pass owners can meet the Witch from Disney and Pixar's Brave and invite her to their Kingdom.

Prepare for Christmas with Santa Claus from Disney Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas collection, plus his Candy Costume.

Don’t miss out on the magical new concessions and decorations!

descriptionShort: Build your Disney Park, collect characters, and enjoy magical storylines!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The Muppet Show Has Arrived in the Kingdom!

Things are about to get wild! Join Dr. Bunsen and Beaker's wacky experiments, laugh with Fozzie Bear, and watch Gonzo pull off daring stunts. Don't forget Pepé the King Prawn—he's bringing the sass! Keep an eye out for the Muppet Mobile Lab, where science and mayhem collide, plus new Attractions and Decorations around every corner. Fun and chaos guaranteed!

Inside Out 2 characters to Disney Magic Kingdoms! Say hello to Ennui, the bored and lethargic embodiment of teenage apathy; Envy, the queen of jealousy who always longs for what Riley doesn't have; and Anxiety, the ultimate overthinker, prepared for every possible negative outcome.

descriptionShort: Build your Disney Park, collect characters, and enjoy magical storylines!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Get Ready for a Magical 11th Season!

Reunite Cinderella with the lovable and hilarious duo, Jaq and Gus, who prove that even the smallest friends can make the biggest difference. Join Ellie as she leads her herd through every challenge, and meet Nostalgia, who brings the warmth of treasured memories to every journey. Enhance your Kingdom with new Attractions, Concessions, and Decorations to add heartwarming elements to your collection!

Let the magic sweep you off your feet!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Get ready, Kingdomers! Eddie, Crash, and Buck from Ice Age are here to bring some wild fun to your Kingdom!

Prepare for a hilarious adventure filled with mischief, mayhem, and plenty of laughs, because with this trio, it's always a ""dino-mite"" good time!

Add some frosty flair with new Attractions and Concessions! Let your visitors slide into fun with the Glacier Slide, and treat them to a plush sloth toy or a dino hat to keep the prehistoric party going.

Collect characters and heroes from 100 years of Disney’s history, including The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, The Lion King, Toy Story, and many more.
Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Get ready, Kingdomers! Eddie, Crash, and Buck from Ice Age are here to bring some wild fun to your Kingdom!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It's time to find your way through the waves, Kingdomers! Assemble your wayfinding crew, including Moni, Loto, & Kele. Reunite Moana with her little sister, Simea, and conquer the challenges Matangi has set before you in the Moana 2 limited-time event!

Add magical Attractions such as the Giant Clam & Loto's Workshop, plus fun Concessions such as the Coconut Ice Cream Stand, bringing Moana 2 magic to your Kingdom!

Disney Magic Kingdoms celebrates its 9th Anniversary—get ready for the big party!

descriptionShort: Build your Disney Park, collect characters, and enjoy magical storylines!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The Kingdom just got a little shy, a little sleepy, and a lot scarier!

In Update 93, three new characters are joining Disney Magic Kingdoms:
- Inside Out 2: Embarrassment is here! This bashful emotion prefers to hide, but he's ready to join the fun.
- Monsters, Inc.: Henry J. Waternoose has arrived, bringing his business-first attitude.
- Alice in Wonderland: The Dormouse is awake! Hopefully he's ready to enjoy a tea party.

Don't miss this exciting update -- your Kingdom awaits!

title:

creator: Gameloft SE
descriptionHtml:
Create a magical Disney Park filled with Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ characters, attractions, and special events.

Collect Over 300 Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ Characters


Collect characters and heroes from 100 years of Disney’s history, including The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, The Lion King, Toy Story, and many more.
Discover over 1,500 fun and magical character quests. Take to the sky with Peter Pan and Dumbo, ride the waves with Ariel and Nemo, cool down with Elsa and Olaf, and escape to a galaxy far, far away with C-3PO and R2-D2.

Build Your Own Dream Park


Build a Disney Park with 400+ attractions. Include real-world attractions from Disneyland and Disney World, such as Space Mountain, the Haunted Mansion, “it’s a small world,” and the Jungle Cruise.
Decorate your park with unique attractions from Frozen, The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and classic Disney films like Snow White and Lady and the Tramp.
Watch park guests ride and interact with your Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ attractions and celebrate the magic with fireworks and parade floats.

Battle Disney Villains


Save your Park from Maleficent’s evil curse and set the Kingdom free.
Battle against villains like the wicked Ursula, the daring Gaston, the fearsome Scar, and the mighty Jafar.

Regular Limited-Time Events


Disney Magic Kingdoms introduces new content on a regular basis and hosts live limited-time events filled with new characters, attractions, adventures, and more.
Earn limited-time rewards with monthly and weekly special events.

Play Offline: Anytime, Anywhere


Take your Disney Park with you on the go. Play online or offline anytime you want.
